I am Faisal's group mate in our final year project and we are trying
to int=
egrate NEAT with RoboCup Soccer simulation.
What we wanted to know is wheth=
er NEAT learns in a situation where the
inputs are constantly changing and =
it is highly unlikely that the same
set of inputs will ever be repeated.
Wi=
ll the network actually learn anything in this scenario and would it
show a=
ny improvement over time? If so, approximately how long would it
take befor=
e we can expect any learned behavior?
